title: How do you use most of the League of Legends trinkets? i.e. ballista?
body:
Hi there!
I was just wondering why I can't find certain majority of League's trinkets in the shop. I can see them when making item sets, and it says they are available on that map, but they do not appeaar in-game : /
I don't know if this is a bug or something, but I would love it if someone please explained this to me,
Animancer/Icathia

{{champion:75}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:203}}

replies.body: Those trinkets are for the Nexus Siege gamemode which is played on SR which is why they're listed as available on the map, but aren't available in normal games.
Thank you so much! I was really confused by it! : )
